class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.StorageContainer
class.query: select c.id, count(pos) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.StorageContainer c join c.descendentContainers d join d.occupiedPositions pos where c.id in (:containerIds) and pos.occupyingSpecimen is not null group by c.id
delete from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.StorageContainerPosition p where p.reservationId in (:reservationIds)
delete from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.StorageContainerPosition p where (p.blocked is null or p.blocked = 0) and p.reservationTime < :expireTime

select c from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.Shipment s join s.shipmentContainers sc join sc.container c where c.id in (:containerIds) and s.status = 'SHIPPED' and s.activityStatus != 'Disabled'
class.sql-query: select h.descendent_id as leafId from os_containers_hierarchy h inner join os_storage_containers p on p.identifier = h.descendent_id left join os_storage_containers c on c.parent_container_id = p.identifier and c.activity_status != 'Disabled' where h.ancestor_id = :containerId and c.identifier is null and p.activity_status != 'Disabled'

select h.ancestor_id as ancestorId, s.parent_container_id as parentId from os_containers_hierarchy h inner join os_storage_containers s on s.identifier = h.ancestor_id where h.descendent_id = :containerId and h.ancestor_id != h.descendent_id

select s.identifier as containerId, s.name as containerName, s.no_of_rows as noOfRows, s.no_of_cols as noOfColumns, s.pos_assignment as posAssignment, s.parent_container_id as parentId, p.pos_two as rowNo, p.pos_one as colNo from os_storage_containers s inner join os_container_positions p on p.occupying_container_id = s.identifier where s.parent_container_id in (:parentIds) and s.activity_status != 'Disabled'
union all
select s.identifier as containerId, s.name as containerName, s.no_of_rows as noOfRows, s.no_of_cols as noOfColumns, s.pos_assignment as posAssignment, null as parentId, null as rowNo, null as colNo from os_storage_containers s where s.identifier = :rootId and s.activity_status != 'Disabled'

select s.identifier as containerId, s.name as containerName, s.no_of_rows as noOfRows, s.no_of_cols as noOfColumns, null as posAssignment, s.parent_container_id as parentId, p.pos_two as rowNo, p.pos_one as colNo from os_storage_containers s inner join os_container_positions p on p.occupying_container_id = s.identifier where s.parent_container_id = :parentId and s.activity_status != 'Disabled'

select c.identifier as containerId from os_storage_containers c left join os_container_positions p on p.storage_container_id = c.identifier left join os_stor_container_comp_cps allowed_cps on allowed_cps.storage_container_id = c.identifier where c.store_specimens = 1 and c.activity_status = 'Active' and (p.reservation_time is null or p.reservation_time > :reservedLaterThan or p.blocked = 1) and ( allowed_cps.cp_id = :cpId or (allowed_cps.cp_id is null and ( select count(*) from catissue_site_cp cp_site where cp_site.site_id = c.site_id and cp_site.collection_protocol_id = :cpId ) > 0 ) ) and ( ( select count(*) from os_stor_cont_comp_spec_classes cc inner join catissue_permissible_value pcc on pcc.identifier = cc.specimen_class_id where pcc.value = :specimenClass and storage_container_id = c.identifier ) > 0 or ( select count(*) from os_stor_cont_comp_spec_types ct inner join catissue_permissible_value pct on pct.identifier = ct.specimen_type_id where pct.value = :specimenType and storage_container_id = c.identifier ) > 0 ) group by c.identifier, c.no_of_rows, c.no_of_cols having (c.no_of_rows * c.no_of_cols - count(p.identifier)) > (:minFreeLocs - 1) order by (c.no_of_rows * c.no_of_cols - count(p.identifier)), c.identifier

select f.identifier as containerId, count(p.occupying_specimen_id) as storedSpecimens from os_storage_containers f inner join os_containers_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = f.identifier left join os_container_positions p on p.storage_container_id = h.descendent_id where f.identifier in (:containerIds) and f.parent_container_id is null and f.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by f.identifier

select pt.value as type, count(s.identifier) as specimens from os_storage_containers f inner join os_containers_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = f.identifier inner join os_container_positions p on p.storage_container_id = h.descendent_id inner join catissue_specimen s on s.identifier = p.occupying_specimen_id inner join catissue_permissible_value pt on pt.identifier = s.specimen_type_id where f.activity_status != 'Disabled' and f.identifier = :containerId group by pt.value

select a.identifier as ancestorId, d.identifier as descendantId from os_storage_containers a inner join os_containers_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = a.identifier inner join os_storage_containers d on d.identifier = h.descendent_id where a.identifier in (:containerIds) and a.activity_status != 'Disabled' and d.activity_status != 'Disabled' and a.identifier != d.identifier
